banner.title: THE TASTE OF TRADITION
banner.subtitle: An authentic ramen that honour the rich culinary heritage of Japan. Our chefs use only the freshest ingredients, and carefully prepare each bowl of ramen with the utmost attention to detail.

about.message:
The hallmark of our broth is Tonkotsu Shoyu. To make it, we carefully simmer a blend of pork backbones, pork knuckles, chicken bones, kombu, and vegetables.
This results in a rich broth which infused with soy sauce, green onions, and garlic.
The finishing touch is the addition of chicken oil (chÄ«yu), creating the distinctive flavor profile of our Yah Yah Ya ramen.
